recommended_degree: Teknik Industri, Teknik Mesin, Teknik Elektro, Teknik Elektronika Industri, Mekatronika (Sarjana)
job_description:
1. Lead production team members
2. Monitoring and maintain continuity of production process
3. Ensure quality input and output products
4. Do continuous improvement in production department
5. Create production report periodically
6. Ensure team member able to achieve production target on time
